hero.title: Precision Audio Control at Your Fingertips
hero.description: Take command of your entire audio environment with JyvDesktop's powerful control center. Manage application volumes, routing, and profiles with unprecedented precision.

features.title: Complete Audio Control System
features.description: JyvDesktop gives you unprecedented control over every aspect of your system's audio, from individual application volumes to complex routing scenarios and custom profiles.

interactiveDemo.title: Try JyvDesktop's Audio Control
interactiveDemo.description: Experience how JyvDesktop gives you precise control over your audio environment. Adjust application volumes, devices, and profiles in this interactive demo.

appMixer.title: Application Mixer
appMixer.description: Adjust volume and routing for individual applications

footer.disclaimer: Interactive demo - functionality is limited compared to the full application
footer.readyText: Ready to experience the full power of JyvDesktop's audio control?

useCases.title: Perfect Audio for Every Scenario
useCases.description: JyvDesktop's advanced audio control adapts to your specific needs, whether you're in a meeting, gaming with friends, or deep in a creative workflow.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about JyvDesktop's audio control features
